QuestData.Title: Entangling an Elekk
QuestData.Description: The plains of Nagrand are the most lush and fertile that I have ever seen. Should you ever see them, you will come upon the mightiest beasts that this place has to offer.$B$BAmong them, the great elekk. A magnificent beast with horns that can grow larger than you or I.$B$BHere is another rope, should you wish to tangle with such a beast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Elekk Lasso on a Young Meadowstomper and follow it until it is tamed.
